attributes.action: Ban the Quran (Koran) in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
I call for a ban on the quran (Koran) in th UK as hate speach. This book is full of hatred for all that do not believe in their ways and it is being used as a way for Muslims to do as they please simply because this book says its ok to do so.
We must not allow the teachings of this outdated religious cult to take hold in this country, it is being used to justify the murder of innocent people.
